website_summaries.verdict: A good option for a travel wipes holder with an affordable price point.
pros: This wipes case not only gets top marks for its price, but also for its simple yet sturdy design
Customers appreciate the cute look, and that it holds enough wipes and keeps them moist
cons: Some felt the case didn't close tightly enough so wipes dried out
not as durable as some of the other options on the market

customer_reviews.title: I like the cute whale design that it came with
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new wipe case that can fit into my Jujube Be Quick bag since I lost my other one. The slim case closes tightly to ensure the wipes stay moist. I like the cute whale design that it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Twins

customer_reviews.title: Good looking case
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this product. The problem I’ve had in the past with these travel cases is the wipes dry out after a while. I update if the wipes stay moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: EmCee

customer_reviews.title: So cute and works great! Been using this for a few months now ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute and works great! Been using this for a few months now and the little image is still clear (not chipped, scratched, faded, etc...), the box still shuts tight, and the wipes stay wet. It holds more than I expect but it's still a good size. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Neilsons

customer_reviews.title: I stepped on the free Huggies travel wipes case that ...
customer_reviews.text: I stepped on the free Huggies travel wipes case that they give you when you register at BRU so I needed a new one. This does the trick! Simple, cute to look at, and holds just enough wipes. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great design and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special, its a plastic case that shuts with a snap. The design is really cute and the wipes stay moist so am happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: steponmytoes

customer_reviews.title: Green
customer_reviews.text: I love the whale on it. It's a nice to go box.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: Unique product. Couldn't find any of these hard boxes in the stores, so looked on here. This keeps the wipes moist and is small and handy. Not to mention the cute design. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Vola D.

customer_reviews.title: Good enough wipe holder
customer_reviews.text: Its sturdy, but it just doesn't hold a lot of wipes. Its good just if you want to travel with a few wipes for a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya Beckles

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! Wish this had a small opening on top ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Wish this had a small opening on top to separate wipes
customer_reviews.author: Tao Chumbley

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This sucks and barely holds any wipes and the wipes dry out
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Carmili

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery. Purchased for a new mother and she ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Purchased for a new mother and she loves the little case which goes with her whale décor. Just right size for that oh too full diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Really didn't love the available designs
customer_reviews.text: Whale scratches off early on... Really didn't love the available designs...
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Hayes-Geer

customer_reviews.title: Cute box
customer_reviews.text: Cute wipebox.. good construction and similar to the simple wipeboxes out there.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect place to put wipes and keep around the house or take on travel.
customer_reviews.author: Maggi C.

customer_reviews.title: Not at all happy..
customer_reviews.text: Not at all happy.....the little plastic that holds the box shut broke in 1 day and has the wipes drying out😐
customer_reviews.author: Shamsudeen Said

customer_reviews.title: Good item and works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Good item and works pretty well, although it would be a little more helpful if the top had a flap from which you could pull the wet-wipe out directly without having to open the case up completely. This would help when working one-handed!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Just a wipe box. but I got it because ...
customer_reviews.text: Just a wipe box. but I got it because of the cute whale design. Functional and simple
customer_reviews.author: Nancy pants

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Cute and works great! Everyone who sees it loves it and asks where I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: Not durable. It cracked on the corner when dropped ...
customer_reviews.text: Not durable. It cracked on the corner when dropped from the height of less than 2 ft.
customer_reviews.author: Jolly Roger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the design and size of it. perfect for the diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not snap shut. Remains open and dries out wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute- not practical though. Wouldn't reccommend since it does not hold many wipes
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Has held up for many months of twins at preschool.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: It's plastic, it holds wipes, it hasn't broken ...
customer_reviews.text: It's plastic, it holds wipes, it hasn't broken. The whale makes my baby smile when I am wiping their butt.
customer_reviews.author: Barnabus Whackenbush

customer_reviews.title: So cute but not functional! I don't know what ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute but not functional! I don't know what I was thinking! Rookie move?! One blow out on the road and you will be out if wipes!
customer_reviews.author: TRexMom

customer_reviews.title: I found it too tedious to refill it before each walk so I ended ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine could not be closed properly. And anyway it's too small and could store wipes just for one short walk. I found it too tedious to refill it before each walk so I ended up with using wipes in it regular bags
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Nice quality and just more fun than a plain white one.
customer_reviews.author: KIM F.

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift from my baby shower. It's ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift from my baby shower. It's cute it went with my nautical theme BUT it doesn't hold a lot therefore the wipes get dried out so fast and it's not convenient to fight with the wipes when you only need 1 or 2 and they all come out. Also not worth more than $3 in my eyes. Bigger container and top flap would improve it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheshire Cat

customer_reviews.title: Cute Little Wipes Case
customer_reviews.text: After my husband accidentally recycled our old wipes case, I went out searching for another. I went to almost every store and could not find one like the one we had. I stumbled upon this adorable little case and had him buy it for me. I love it! It is durable and very portable, and super cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Laura W.

product_meta.title: Wipebox by Uber Mom
product_meta.description: A reusable, designer wipe case that fits all wipes. Durable. Stylish. Fits all wipes.
